doc.title: Kung Fu and Ta-Tas
doc.plot: A never take itself too seriously and forever popular boy loves girl, girl is in trouble, boy must be heroic to save her and the day story, serves as the foundation for this hilarious odyssey of chops and tops. While poking outrageous fun of a particular male obsession the movie is a celebrated adventure that includes the action excitement of mixed martial arts fighting and the universal appeal of beautiful women to exceptionally entertain a large demographic of movie lovers.
